item.source: How do i change the picture on a 508

item.title: How do i change the picture on a 508
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:2, topic:318919”]you need to edit the redstones that are located in your client.

it will either be in a folder called files and then a subfolder, a folder labeled sprites, or a folder called images.

for editing i would use gimp or ms paint to change the color.

and remember the image files are titled redstone.[/quote]thanks

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the picture on a 508

item.title: How do i change the picture on a 508
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

you need to edit the redstones that are located in your client.

it will either be in a folder called files and then a subfolder, a folder labeled sprites, or a folder called images.

for editing i would use gimp or ms paint to change the color.

and remember the image files are titled redstone.

Read full topic
